shortDescription: Hear cups and move head, seated and hand supported
longDescription: {0} is seated and supported by their own hands. Knock two cups together continuously, allowing {0} to see the motions and hear the sounds. {0} is able to move their head actively in reaction.

shortDescription: Hear cups and move head, in a standing posture and somewhat supported
longDescription: {0} is in a standing posture and somewhat supported (e.g. holding on to you). Knock two cups together continuously, allowing {0} to see the motions and hear the sounds. {0} is able to move their head actively in reaction.
Give a shape to {0}. {0} is able to grasp and hold the shape with two hands for a few seconds.

shortDescription: Grasp one shape in each hand
longDescription: Give two shapes to {0}. {0} is able to grasp and hold the one shape in each hand for a few seconds.

shortDescription: Transfer shape from hand to hand
longDescription: Give a shape to {0}. {0} is able to transfer the shape from one hand to the other.
{0} is holding onto one shape. {0} is able to reach for another shape, without necessarily touching it.
{0} is on their back. Build a tower near {0}'s feet. {0} is able to kick down the tower.

shortDescription: Kick down reverse tower, on back
longDescription: {0} is on their back. Build a reverse tower near {0}'s feet. {0} is able to kick down the tower.

shortDescription: Kick down tower, in a standing posture and somewhat supported
longDescription: {0} is in a standing posture and somewhat supported (e.g. holding on to you). Build a tower near {0}'s feet. {0} is able to kick down the tower.

shortDescription: Kick down reverse tower, in a standing posture and somewhat supported
longDescription: {0} is in a standing posture and somewhat supported (e.g. holding on to you). Build a reverse tower near {0}'s feet. {0} is able to kick down the tower.
{0} is able to bang a shape on a surface, such as the floor or a table.

shortDescription: React in any way, parent calling name
longDescription: Call {0}'s name. {0} is able to react in any way, such as moving their head or making sounds.

shortDescription: Babble to people to seek attention
longDescription: {0} is able to babble to a person in order to seek their attention.

shortDescription: Extend arms and legs, when lowered quickly downward
longDescription: Hold {0} in the air and lower them quickly downward. {0} is able to extend their arms and legs in reaction.

shortDescription: Pat or poke at a parent's face
longDescription: Put your face close to {0}. {0} is able to pat or poke your face.

shortDescription: Sit for 3 seconds, leaning on hands
longDescription: {0} is able to sit and support themself by leaning on their hands.
